sentences.sContent: This thrilling story will keep you on the edge of your seat as you explore the house, collect items and unravel cryptic secrets.
sentences.sContent_eng: This thrilling story will keep you on the edge of your seat as you explore the house, collect items and unravel cryptic secrets.
sentences.sCn: 这惊心动魄的故事，将让你在你的座位边，为您探索的房子，收集物品和解开神秘的秘密。

synos.tran: 神秘的，含义模糊的；[动]隐藏的

trans.tranCn: 秘密的， 含义模糊的
trans.tranOther: having a meaning that is mysterious or not easily understood
